name: Curse of the Botanomancer
description:
This is a pixel procedural game for the 2023 Beginner Winter Game Jam. This is my first game for a game jam and I worked on it occasionally during my free time, so it may have a few bugs.

Story:

You play as a water sentinel awoken to remove a powerful cultist who has taken the labarinth's seed of life. With the seed, the cultist has raised a powerful army of plants. Can you stop him?

Attacking:

combat in this game requires strategy. You play as a water sentry, so you can hold down the left mouse button to summon a drop of water. If this drop of water hits any dirt (brown) tiles, a plant minion will be summoned that will hone in on  enemies. If you die, you will be sent back to your last checkpoint (flower).
